semantic_categories.name: Measurement & Analytics
semantic_categories.semantic_domain: Trust Debt quantification, metrics, scoring algorithms
semantic_categories.description: Core measurement systems including Trust Debt calculation, scoring algorithms, metrics collection, and analytical frameworks
semantic_categories.conceptual_focus: HOW we measure and quantify trust debt

semantic_categories.name: Implementation & Engineering
semantic_categories.semantic_domain: Code architecture, algorithms, system design, technical execution
semantic_categories.description: Technical implementation including algorithms, system architecture, code quality, and engineering practices
semantic_categories.conceptual_focus: HOW we build and engineer the system

semantic_categories.name: Documentation & Governance
semantic_categories.description: Documentation systems, governance frameworks, compliance processes, and knowledge management
semantic_categories.conceptual_focus: HOW we document and govern the system

semantic_categories.name: Visualization & Interfaces
semantic_categories.semantic_domain: User interfaces, reports, visualizations, user experience
semantic_categories.description: Visual systems including HTML reports, user interfaces, data visualization, and user experience design
semantic_categories.conceptual_focus: HOW we present and visualize information

semantic_categories.name: Integration & Orchestration
semantic_categories.semantic_domain: Multi-agent coordination, pipeline management, system integration
semantic_categories.description: System integration including multi-agent orchestration, pipeline coordination, and system interoperability
semantic_categories.conceptual_focus: HOW we coordinate and integrate system components

agent_2_handoff.critical_question: These 5 semantic categories (Measurement, Implementation, Documentation, Visualization, Integration) eliminate syntax noise and focus on conceptual domains. Do they accurately represent the IntentGuard repository's core functional areas?

user_approval_required.categories_presented: A📊 Measurement & Analytics, B💻 Implementation & Engineering, C📋 Documentation & Governance, D🎨 Visualization & Interfaces, E⚙️ Integration & Orchestration
user_approval_required.domain_explanation: These represent the 5 core conceptual domains of trust debt management: measuring it, building systems for it, governing it, visualizing it, and integrating it
